data.eml:eml: Second highly modified hypogean species of the genus Morimotoidius Habu from western Jiangxi Province, China, with a new locality for M. zhushandong (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Platynini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Xinhui, Pang, Jianmei, Tian, Mingyi (2015): Second highly modified hypogean species of the genus Morimotoidius Habu from western Jiangxi Province, China, with a new locality for M. zhushandong (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Platynini). Zootaxa 4034 (3): 587-593, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4034.3.10
